class_notes: **Permission of Instructor or BIOS ADAP required**
course_description: Prerequisites: Multivariate Calculus (Calculus III) and Linear Algebra or permission of instructor.  Introduction to Probability, random variables, distributions, conditional distributions, expectations, moment generating functions, order statistics, and convergence concepts.
sections: Class Nbr: 1516, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: WF 1-2:50p, Instructor: R. Zhang, Status: Open
